description:
MPCOIN is the new blockchain easily accessible in our daily lives, such as education, dining, shopping, leisure, ETC, by improving the existing privacy coin's problems.

In the future, MPcoin could be encashed into USD or KRW and also exchangeable to other virtual currency, such as Ethereum.

Since MP coin is the Edutech based life coin, its original smart learning program called 'MAPOOK smart learning' will be launched in other Asian countries, starting with China, Vietnam, and Japan smart learning edutech market.
name: MPCoin
